Elderly man punched in head during attempted mugging on Broadway, Newmarket after doing Christmas shopping https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/elderly-man-punched-on-broadway-newmarket-after-his-christmas-shopping/J52CPUDVKRBY7HJCXMIPJ23WDA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/elderly-man-punched-on-broadway-newmarket-after-his-christmas-shopping/J52CPUDVKRBY7HJCXMIPJ23WDA/ Raphael FranksSecurity guards caught the offender who apologised to the victim.Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:29:40 +0000 An elderly man was punched on Broadway, Newmarket during an attempted mugging after he did his Christmas shopping on Friday.
Murderer Stephen Thomas Hudson wins court fight over ‘lad mags’ in prison https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/murderer-stephen-thomas-hudson-wins-court-fight-over-lad-mags-in-prison/QLM7KQ7DMZCBNGS773VX6SA3T4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/murderer-stephen-thomas-hudson-wins-court-fight-over-lad-mags-in-prison/QLM7KQ7DMZCBNGS773VX6SA3T4/ Melissa NightingaleThe court has ruled a murderer should have been allowed the magazines while in jail. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:12:45 +0000 Prisoners' access to men's magazines behind bars has been the subject of a court hearing. Photo / 123rf
Lisa’s brand hummus batch recalled after incorrect labelling prompts nut allergy fears https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lisas-brand-hummus-batch-recalled-after-in Correct-labelling-prompts-nut-allergy-fears/GJ4JSHXGWVHUFFDJINARG5OAKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lisas-brand-hummus-batch-recalled-after-in Correct-labelling-prompts-nut-allergy-fears/GJ4JSHXGWVHUFFDJINARG5OAKM/ MPI hasn’t yet received any reports of an associated allergic reaction. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:12:18 +0000 Life Health Foods NZ Ltd is recalling a specific batch of its Lisa’s Hummus Chargrilled Capsicum due to the presence of an undeclared allergen tree nut (cashew).
Pt England gang shooting: Traumatised couple flee rental after witnessing alleged murder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/pt-england-gang-shooting-traumatized- Couple-flee-rental-after-witnessing-alleged-murder/N5XMZTPBHFHMJCKIXBFZVWRYM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/pt-england-gang-shooting-traumatized- Couple-flee-rental-after-witnessing-alleged-murder/N5XMZTPBHFHMJCKIXBFZVWRYM4/ Tara ShaskeyThe landlord was left thousands out of pocket, the Tenancy Tribunal heard. Photo / Hayden Woodward
